quick_wins: Add FAQ entries to address pricing objections.
Strengthen internal links to related pages.

issues.title: Missing title tag
issues.description: The page does not include a <title> tag.
issues.how_to_fix:
- Add a concise, keyword-aligned title
- Keep it within 50-60 characters
- Make sure it matches page intent

issues.title: Content is thin
issues.description: The page has fewer than 800 words.
issues.how_to_fix:
1. Expand the core explanation
2. Add comparisons and FAQs
3. Include proof points and examples

issues.title: Images are not optimized
issues.description: Large images slow down page load.
issues.how_to_fix: Compress images and serve WebP when possible.

content_brief:
Primary topic: SaaS pricing page optimization

Suggested outline:
- Explain who the pricing is for
- Break down plan differences
- Highlight trust signals

FAQs:
- Can I cancel anytime?
- Do you offer annual discounts?

Keywords to cover:
- saas pricing page
- pricing page best practices
- pricing page FAQ
